eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Pennsylvania; at 02:45 AM ON DEC 18, 2025 Effective until 04:45 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Test This is a State Wide Required Monthly Test of the Emergency Alert System originating from the Pennsylvania Emergency Management Agency, Harrisburg. This is only a test
